'''Organic batteries''', that are environmentally friendly and cost-effective, represent promising alternatives to current [[lithium-ion batteries]]. The rise of [[electromobility]] creates high demands on [[lithium-ion batteries]], inevitably resulting in heavy consumptions of [[transition metals]]. Usage of these resources raises concerns about the limited availability of [[transition metals]] and the associated [[environmental footprint]].
